member.name: T:NSwag.Annotations.ResponseTypeAttribute
member.summary: Specifies the result type of a web service method to correctly generate a Swagger definition.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The JSON result type of the MVC or Web API action method.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The HTTP status code for which the result type applies.
The JSON result type of the MVC or Web API action method.

member.name: P:NSwag.Annotations.ResponseTypeAttribute.HttpStatusCode
member.summary: Gets or sets the HTTP status code for which the result type applies.

member.name: P:NSwag.Annotations.ResponseTypeAttribute.ResponseType
member.summary: Gets or sets the JSON result type of the MVC or Web API action method.

member.name: P:NSwag.Annotations.ResponseTypeAttribute.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the description of the response.

member.name: T:NSwag.Annotations.SwaggerIgnoreAttribute
member.summary: Excludes an action method from the generated Swagger specification.
